comments:
Attached is a library. It uses classic models in mysql.
Drag the Unit Sales Dashboard onto a report and run and you get the error -

The following items have errors: 


report report: 
+ Group key "year(orderdate)" in group 1 cannot depend on column bindings defined in the group lower than itself.  
data.engine.InvalidGroupKey ( 1 time(s) )

Source)
This bug is because if report table extends a library table, the table group will be renamed to "NewTableGroup1". While, actually group element should get its name from virtual parent first.

traces.message: Group key "year(orderdate)" in group 1 cannot depend on column bindings defined in the group lower than itself.
